=== Prerequisites ===

To build, jSCEP from source, you'll need the following tools:

 * [http://subversion.apache.org/ Subversion]
 * [http://maven.apache.org/ Apache Maven]

{{{
user@host:~$ svn checkout http://jscep.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ jscep-read-only
user@host:~$ cd jscep-read-only
user@host:~/jscep-read-only$ mvn install
}}}

The above commands will check out the source code from the jSCEP subversion repository, followed by building each of the project artefacts and installing them into your local Maven repository.
